DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ass whether treatment study drug , panitumumab give concomitantly every 2 ( Q2 ) week oxaliplatin-based chemotherapy bevacizumab improve progression-free survival ( PFS ) compare treatment Q2-week oxaliplatin-based chemotherapy bevacizumab alone .
